group_1.textRight: That Aoharu Track Club...@I knew you planned something.
It's your letter; you read it.

group_1.narration: To Urara,
I hope I'm just worrying for nothing,@but there's times when I think that@you just can't fit in with the group,@and that you might go off on your own somewhere.
That's why I was nosy,@why I would listen to your troubles,@why I would come consult with you.@I wanted to be the one who let you be at ease.
But, if I'm no longer here,@all that meddling will burn up in flames,@and you'll end up quietly leaving somewhere@and no one may even notice.
So before that happened,@I wanted to create an opportunity for you@to talk to Yuna and everyone.
So, that's why@I left this certificate of honor to you.

group_1.textRight: So you just left the rest to me, did you...?
I'm happy to know Sakuya had faith in me...

group_1.textLeft: (And me...to think she had that much concern@for me...)
That's a horrible way a sayin' it!

group_1.textRight: It just pisses me off a bit.
Writing like SHE'S the only one who cares@about Urara...
don't we all care about Urara?

group_1.textLeft: (They think of me... As a friend...?)

group_1.textRight: Oh...there seems to be one more paper inside...

group_1.narration: If you do consult with Yuna,@I'm sure she'll tell you this, but...
Don't worry.@You've been doing your duties properly,@just like I knew you would,@and you're fitting in with the group just fine.
And it's all thanks to you@that the atmosphere around us has calmed down,@because doing all of your tasks@to your utmost best inspired all of us.
Your place is right here.@So don't feel like you have to leave, okay?
Give my regards to Yuna and everyone.@From Sakuya

group_1.textCenter: (There's somewhere else I have to be,@so I'm leaving...)
(That I get to properly part ways with everyone...)

group_1.textLeft: She is...@Sakuya got to speak first...

group_1.textRight: We want you to have this!
A board we all wrote on for ya!
We only just heard about the farewell party,@so we rushed to make it.
Go on, Urara, please take it.

group_1.narration: ―Hikaru―@All together!
―Everyone―@Thank you for being with@Promised Blood, Urara!
―Juri―@For a brat, you got chops.
―Ranka―@We know you do your best.@Good work.
―Urara―@*Sob*...
Ever since I infiltrated Promised Blood,@I always worried my identity@would be found out,
and Yuna and everyone looked like@they used power and fear to control everyone.@I couldn't help but be scared.
But...that wasn't true.
Everyone in Futatsugi cares for each other,@and places their utmost trust@in one another...
Spending time with everyone like this...
―Urara―@(Before I knew it...@I started to like everyone...)
―Urara―@...
―Urara―@Yuna, Hikaru,@Juri, Ranka, everyone...
―Urara―@And...Sakuya...
―Urara―@Thank you...@For everything...
